metadata.title: CVE-2023-46426 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in gpac version2.3-DEV-rev588-g7edc40fee-master, allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code and cause a denial of service (DoS) via gf_fwrite componentin at utils/os_file.c.

criterions.comment: gpac package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
